comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: This Austin Flint (1836-1915) was a doctor and medical school professor. He was one of the founders of Bellevue Hospital, and New York's surgeon general. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Austin_Flint_(1836%e2%80%931915) His father was also Dr. Austin Flint (1812-1886), a prominent writer and lecturer on cardiology, typhoid fever, and contagious diseases. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Austin_Flint
